headline: LEYBOLD DUST SEPARATOR/MOLECULAR FILTER
categories.lvl2: Vacuum Processing Equipment  >  Vacuum Pumps > Vacuum Pump Accessories
specstable:
Manufacturer Leybold
Model AS/MF 100-250
Description Dust Separator/Molecular Filter
Inlet Flange ISO-K 70.0 mm (2.756 in)
Exhaust Flange ASA 70.0 mm (2.756 in)
Other Information Designed as a cyclone separator
Second stage filtration is by passing gases thruogh oil-wetted pall-rings in an inner basket trapping particles larger than 2 microns.
Molecular filter element is interchangeable with the pall-ring basket(not included)
This filter used with the following Leybold pumps: E150, E25, DK100, and DK200(ASA)
Leybold P/N 17802-M
Exterior Dimensions
Width 15.000 in (38.1 cm)
Height 27.000 in (68.6 cm)
Weight 58 lb (26 kg)
